channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Richard Mille Takes Quartz Watches to a Surprising Level
item.description: A company that emerged from the marine engineering sector holds the secret to the ultra-luxury brand’s remarkable material that is as light as plastic...

item.title: 5 Best Sock Subscription Services (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Never run out of socks again. These subscription services deliver premium pairs right to your door.

item.title: WhatsApp says it disrupted a hacking campaign targeting journalists with Paragon spyware
item.description: The Meta-owned company said the campaign was linked to Israeli spyware maker Paragon. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 6 Best Dash Appliances (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From a mini waffle maker to a rapid egg cooker, these tiny kitchen appliances are easy on the wallet and don’t hog space.

item.title: DeepSeek Has Gotten OpenAI Fired Up
item.description: After a Chinese-startup roiled the industry, OpenAI readies a response—ahead of schedule.

item.title: Backed by Mayo Clinic, Nutrix’s hardware monitors worker stress

item.title: Tata Technologies says ransomware attack hit IT assets, investigation ongoing
item.description: India's Tata Technologies has disclosed a ransomware attack affecting its IT assets. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
